tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE device_settings (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location_info JSONB,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceUpdates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    update_version VARCHAR(20),
    update_description TEXT,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES DeviceConfigSettings(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE configuration_settings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    setting_name VARCHAR(50),
    setting_value VARCHAR(100),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE device_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(50),
    parameter_value VARCHAR(100),
    parameter_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE firmware_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    update_version VARCHAR(20),
    update_description TEXT,
    update_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceSettings (
 device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_name VARCHAR(255),
 firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
 configuration_settings JSON
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceLogs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 log_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceCommands (
 command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 command_type VARCHAR(50),
 command_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceUpdates (
 update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 update_version VARCHAR(50),
 update_details JSON
)
CREATE TABLE Device ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name STRING, device_type STRING, manufacturer STRING, firmware_version STRING );
CREATE TABLE Configuration ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT, config_name STRING, config_value STRING, FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Device(id) );
CREATE TABLE Network ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT, network_name STRING, ip_address STRING, subnet_mask STRING, gateway STRING, FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Device(id) );
CREATE TABLE Firmware ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT, version STRING, description STRING, released_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Device(id) );
CREATE TABLE UpdateLog ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_id INT, update_description STRING, update_date DATE, update_status STRING, FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Device(id) );
